articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: But the bust firm’s co-founders still aren’t cooperating, a Friday document shows.
articles.title: Three Arrows Liquidators Seize $35M, Seek $30M More for 'Much Wow' Superyacht

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The “Degen Trilogy” series is on hold, the company confirmed to Decrypt, months after the widely panned first entry was released.
articles.title: Coinbase Pauses Plans for Bored Ape Yacht Club NFT Short Film Trilogy

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: MetaMask’s co-founder and co-lead developer Dan Finlay says he’s prepared to take a stand against Apple in solidarity with Coinbase Wallet.
articles.title: MetaMask Co-Founder Wants to 'Dump' Apple, Calls iOS Purchase Tax 'Abuse'

articles.title: Maxine Waters Thanks SBF for Being 'Candid' About FTX Collapse

articles.description: Sources have told Decrypt that Apollo wants to offer retail crypto trading on Yahoo Finance.
articles.title: Yahoo to Offer Retail Stock Trading—Is Crypto Next?

articles.description: 'Tis the season to be jolly—spread some festive cheer with our guide to the best holiday crypto gifts for all budgets.
articles.title: Crypto Holiday Gift Guide 2022

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: GK8, one of the assets put up for auction during Celsius’ bankruptcy proceedings, will play a role in Galaxy Digital’s institutional offering.
articles.title: Galaxy Digital Wins Celsius Bankruptcy Auction to Acquire Crypto Custodian GK8

articles.author: Will McCurdy
articles.description: Shortly after axing its blockchain project, the Australian Securities Exchange has now laid off 200 contractors working on the project.
articles.title: Australian Stock Exchange Fires 200 Contractors Working on Canceled Blockchain Project

articles.description: Daniel Shin attended a court hearing over whether he should be arrested for allegedly extracting illegal profits prior to Terra's collapse.
articles.title: Korean Prosecutors Seek Arrest of Terra Co-Founder Over $105M LUNA Sale

articles.description: Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao announced that the exchange had paused withdrawals following an exploit on the crypto node project Ankr.

articles.description: The internal agency compares the failure of FTX to that of Lehman Brothers and New Century Financial.
articles.title: DOJ Watchdog Seeks Independent Examiner of FTX Collapse

articles.description: The documents would help liquidators locate funds and settle claims with the creditors of the bankrupt hedge fund.
articles.title: Three Arrows Founders Have One Week to Provide Key Financial Documents: Singapore Court

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Trading in November is about 88% lower than January as overall volume and total NFTs sold both slump even further.
articles.title: Solana Soars, Flow Falls as NFT Market Declines Further in November

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: Among the politicians who haven't commented on their SBF donations: Sens. Boozman and Stabenow, who co-sponsored the DCCPA bill.
articles.title: Politicians Are Giving Back Their Donations From Disgraced FTX Founder

articles.author: Decrypt Staff
articles.description: Crypto's leading lights gathered for the inaugural Crypties Awards at Art Basel Miami. Check out the winners and the highlights.
articles.title: The Inaugural Crypties Awards: In Pictures!

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Apple has begun enforcing its 30% tax on NFT transactions, and Coinbase isn’t happy.
articles.title: Apple Forces Coinbase to Disable NFT Transfers on Its Wallet App

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: CFTC Chairman Rostin Behnam told Senators today that his agency needs more power to regulate crypto following the collapse of FTX.
articles.title: CFTC Chair: Crypto 'Potentially a Threat to National Security' After FTX Crash

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The Open Creator Protocol lets creators of new NFT collections block marketplaces that refuse to honor royalties on OCP-enabled assets.
articles.title: Magic Eden Launches Solana NFT Tool to Enforce Creator Royalties

articles.author: Decrypt Staff
articles.description: The fully-regulated NFT platform lets users buy NFT shares of a racehorse syndicate that maps to one horse, or a collection of horses.
articles.title: Crown Ribbon is Shaking Up the $300B Horse Racing Industry With NFTs

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: The KuCoin Earn page has been advertising APRs of 233.15% on Ethereum, 253.28% on Bitcoin, and 100% on Tether deposits.
articles.title: KuCoin Draws Ire for Sky-High Yields on Bitcoin Dual Investment Earn Products

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Untethered to Ape mania, All Seeing Seneca details her new art auction, developing her surreal style, and why royalties matter.
articles.title: Bored Ape NFT Artist Seneca Continues on Her Own Path With 'Portraiture'

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Dogecoin has continued a week-long rally on the back of continued speculation it would be integrated into Twitter.
articles.title: Dogecoin Up 24% in Past Week as Twitter Speculation Refuses to Die

articles.description: The statement noted that INX is a FINRA- and SEC-regulated broker dealer, but didn't disclose how much it had bid for Voyager's assets.
articles.title: Broker-Dealer INX Joins Binance in Bidding for Voyager Assets

articles.author: Will McCurdy
articles.description: BlackRock joins a growing number of firms backing the tokenization of securities, despite the CEO’s wider crypto cynicism.
articles.title: BlackRock CEO Says ‘Next Generation for Markets’ Is Tokenization

articles.description: Polkadex Orderbook’s novel model combines the best features of centralized and decentralized exchanges.
articles.title: How Polkadex is Addressing the ‘Bottlenecks’ of Decentralized Exchanges

articles.description: The move follows a similar tax announcement from Portugal, which announced a hefty 28% tax on crypto gains in October.
articles.title: Italy Mulls 26% Crypto Gains Tax as Binance, Gemini Set Up Shop

articles.description: CFTC Commissioner Christy Goldsmith Romero proposed a two-tier regulatory system, separating retail investors from high-net-worth individuals.
articles.title: CFTC Commissioner Wants Two-Tier Crypto Rules for Retail Investors and Millionaires

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: As the ex-CEO spoke with journalist Andrew Ross Sorkin about the fall of FTX, Crypto Twitter did not like what it was hearing.
articles.title: SBF Roasted for Tone-Deaf NYT Interview

articles.description: The former FTX CEO said he was unaware of the exchange funneling assets to Alameda, but on-chain data suggests otherwise.
articles.title: SBF at Dealbook Summit: 'I Didn’t Knowingly Commingle Funds'

articles.description: Breitman says FTX's collapse is having a big impact on regulation and deal-making for the crypto industry.
articles.title: Tezos Co-Founder Kathleen Breitman on FTX Fallout: 'A Lot of Goodwill Is Gone Now'

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: Founder and CEO Pavel Durov wants to steer crypto back towards trustless models.
articles.title: Telegram Announces Plans to Build Decentralized Crypto Exchange Following FTX Failure

articles.description: The wider crypto market jumped with stocks Wednesday after Jerome Powell hinted at less aggressive interest rate hikes to come.
articles.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Jump as Fed Chair Signals Slowing Rate Hikes

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The company behind the publishing platform said it “will likely be dead in the near future”—but its blockchain will live on.
articles.title: LBRY Says Company Has Been 'Killed by Legal and SEC Debts'

articles.author: Stephen Graves
articles.description: According to Cardano founder Charles Hoskinson, the demise of FTX is a bellwether for a move "from companies and people to protocols."
articles.title: Cardano’s Hoskinson: FTX Collapse Proves ‘Absolute Need’ for Decentralization

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: After landing regulatory approval in a host of European nations, Binance is now reentering the Japanese market via a new acquisition.
articles.title: Binance Acquires Japanese Crypto Exchange Sakura

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: In crypto's race to the moon, seeking legal advice is often an afterthought, says blockchain attorney Lisa Rubin. That could backfire.
articles.title: Why Web3 Builders Should Get Legal Help Before Launching

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Despite its headcount crunch, Kraken founder Jesse Powell remains “extremely bullish on crypto.”
articles.title: Kraken Lays Off 30% of Staff as Bitcoin Bear Market Persists

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: The company will begin offering Ethereum compatibility for its self-custodial wallets and security services in January.
articles.title: Bitcoin Security Firm Casa Embraces Ethereum

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Uniswap is also airdropping $5 million to some early Genie adopters.
articles.title: Uniswap Calls Its New NFT Aggregator a ‘Google Search’ for Trading

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Bitcoin appears to be neither suitable as a payment system nor as a form of investment, according to the European Central Bank.
articles.title: Bitcoin Price Stability 'Last Gasp Before The Road to Irrelevance': ECB

articles.description: Lisa Rubin, a blockchain attorney with Paul Hastings, sat down with Decrypt at 0xpo Crossroads in San Francisco to discuss legal misconceptions the industry still holds.
articles.title: Fintech Lawyer Says Crypto Companies Should Seek Legal Advice Before Launch

articles.description: One of the minds behind the popular Solana dapp sits down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson at 0xpo Crossroads in San Francisco on November 3 to discuss the history of Phantom and what he’s looking forward to in Web3
articles.title: Phantom Co-Founder Francesco Agosti at 0xpo Crossroads

articles.description: "Lost Children of Andromeda" author Jason Michael Primrose, Amanda Terry of Metagood and ACTAI Ventures, Artemysia-X of Rug Radio program LorePlay, and Kas Vegas of NFT INT, Huxley, and Feature.io all discussed how their work utilizes NFTs for storytelling, on a lively panel at Camp Decrypt moderated by What's Trending podcast host Shira Lazar.
articles.title: NFT Storytelling: Jason Michael Primrose, Amanda Terry, Artemysia-X, Kas Vegas at Camp Decrypt 2022

articles.description: In an extensive talk with Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Camp Decrypt in Napa CA in October, Edward Snowden gave his candid views on the Ethereum merge, the sanctioning of Ethereum mixer Tornado Cash by the U.S. government, the privacy shortcomings of Bitcoin and Ethereum, and his view on using DAOs to source tips from whistleblowers.
articles.title: Edward Snowden Talks Tornado Cash Sanctions, Ethereum Merge, DAOs and NFTs at Camp Decrypt 2022

articles.description: Amid a crypto bear market and recent declines in NFT sales volume, what's the new roadmap for new NFT collections? What's expected by community members and collectors? Toni Thai Sterrett of Bad Grrls Creative Club, Jordan Garbis of BeetsDAO, and Eric Feng of NFT block explorer discussed with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at Camp Decrypt Napa.
articles.title: The New Landscape for NFT Drops: Bad Grrls Creative Club, BeetsDAO, and Cymbal at Camp Decrypt 2022

articles.description: Justin Blau aka 3LAU, CEO of Royal, talks to Decrypt's Kate Irwin about building his company around compliance from the start. "We take compliance so seriously that it might make us move a little bit slower... but we think that's really how we have to build in the space." He also said he looks to Coinbase as a model.
articles.title: Musician 3LAU on His Music NFT Platform Royal: 'We Take Compliance Really Seriously'

articles.description: In less than a week, one of the largest and most trusted crypto exchanges went up in flames, along with its crypto celebrity founder and CEO Sam Bankman-Fried. Dan Roberts, Stacy Elliott, and Kate Irwin walk you through exactly how it happened, what it means for you, their own takes on the most interesting subplots, and what we can learn from it all. Plus: We review some comments SBF and CZ made on this podcast that look remarkable in hindsight. Watch Episode 23 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: FTX Meltdown 101: What the Hell Happened and What Comes Next

articles.description: The Tron founder tells Decrypt about the network's decentralized stablecoin USDD, and how Tron aims to "bridge the Web3 world with the real world.
articles.title: Justin Sun On the Future of Tron's USDD Stablecoin

articles.description: As the unsung heroes of digital connectivity, APIs are the engine under the hood making all the interactivity we’ve come to expect online possible. In video five of the Infura Web3 Dev Series, you’ll learn what blockchain APIs are, how they work, and explore the different types of APIs to improve your dapp’s connectivity. Author: Clarissa Watson, Senior Tech Writer at ConsenSys.
articles.title: Decrypt Learn: What Is A Blockchain API?

articles.description: Rug Radio founder Farokh hosted a lively panel at Camp Decrypt Napa on how DAOs are utilizing NFTs, with panelists Lauren Halstead from Chainlink, Tyson Battistella from Zora, Reza Jafery from PubDAO, and Loxley from Rug Radio's associated RugDAO.
articles.title: When DAOs Meet NFTs: Zora, Chainlink, PubDAO and RugDAO at Camp Decrypt 2022

articles.description: Stepn COO Shiti Manghani speaks to Decrypt's Stephen Graves at Solana Breakpoint in Lisbon to discuss how the move-to-earn app is weathering the bear market, its partnership with sportswear manufacturer Asics, and creator royalties on NFT marketplaces.
articles.title: How Stepn Plans to Keep Running Through the Bear Market

articles.description: Brave founder and CEO Brendan Eich joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at Web Summit 2022 to discuss how the  crypto-powered browser is weathering the bear market—and why Web3 needs to get serious about privacy.
articles.title: Brave CEO Brendan Eich: Web3 Isn't Taking Privacy Seriously Enough

articles.description: Farokh, founder of the DAO-governed NFT media brand Rug Radio, speaks to Mike Kriak of ConsenSys Mesh at Camp Decrypt: Napa. He talked about Rug Radio's origins, tokenization, sponsorship money during the bear market, and why it's called Rug Radio.
articles.title: The View from Rug Radio: Farokh Speaks at Camp Decrypt 2022

articles.description: Aave founder Stani Kulechov joined Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott to talk about his vision for the next iteration of DeFi, Aave V3 and Lens Protocol, the Web3 company he wishes he had founded, and why now is the right time for the $5B lending protocol to launch its GHO stablecoin. Watch Episode 22 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Aave Founder Stani Talks Stablecoins and Next Era of DeFi
